description:
Had a issue where images had been moved, had a really hard time tracking it down because it was an INFO line and not an ERROR.

Thought it might save people some time to adjust this to an ERROR.

Running Folsom.

Jan 30 17:15:42 vmperf01 2013-01-30 17:15:42 INFO nova.api.openstack.wsgi [req-b48b959a-5146-4de2-aba0-7907ff4be882 2ec0e33fc6f54ff29a0b2c67a901c6c3 06def676fd0d4ffca909c93d08edec66] HTTP exception thrown: Can not find requested image
title: Log line should be ERROR not INFO

comments.content:
Had a issue where images had been moved, had a really hard time tracking it down because it was an INFO line and not an ERROR.

Thought it might save people some time to adjust this to an ERROR.

Running Folsom.

Jan 30 17:15:42 vmperf01 2013-01-30 17:15:42 INFO nova.api.openstack.wsgi [req-b48b959a-5146-4de2-aba0-7907ff4be882 2ec0e33fc6f54ff29a0b2c67a901c6c3 06def676fd0d4ffca909c93d08edec66] HTTP exception thrown: Can not find requested image
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~josh-ni1sr89

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/20847
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: I don't think this should be logged as an error in the nova api logs because users specifying images that may not exist is part of normal expected behaviour. And the missing request image message is returned in the HTTP response to the request.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cyeoh-0
